A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: With all of the buildup heading into this movie\, it was a huge letdown.  From no new scores\, to lazy storytelling\, no backstory on Snoke\, weak handling of Luke Skywalker\, Princess Leia Superman move (what in the hell was that?)\, forced jokes....it was disappointing.  I was fine with the ending.  I hope JJ can save the Trilogy.  Ironically\, his VII turns out to be a hell of a lot better than VIII now.
